mapper.insert: INSERT INTO book(site_code, user_code, merchant_uid, book_member, book_checkin, book_checkout, book_price, book_car_number) VALUES (#{site_code}, #{user_code}, #{merchant_uid}, #{book_member}, #{book_checkin}, #{book_checkout}, #{book_price}, #{book_car_number})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM book WHERE merchant_uid = #{merchant_uid} And book_state=1
